components.name: Image
components.description: Block level image. Fills parent container. Can work in Cards or Panels.

components.name: BlockLink
examples:
<BlockLink title="Example of BlockLink Component">
  Block link
</BlockLink>
components.description: Block-level link for linking groups of elements

components.name: Card
examples:
<Card 
kicker='Featured'
src='https://c8r.imgix.net/83b8be0c783f4adc7ed73918/58.jpg'
title='Card Title'
subtitle='Card Subtitle'
text="This is descripiton text about the card, it can be several lines long."

/>
components.description: Entire card is a click target. Can be used to preview sites, pages, or articles.

components.name: CardImage
components.description: Image for Card component. Full width of card container and set to display block.

components.name: CardLink
components.description: Wrapper for entire Card component. Can add borders, spacing, boxShadow, and customize interaction styles.

components.name: Container
examples: <Container bg='blue' p={4}>Site container for centering content.</Container>

components.name: Panel
components.jsx: {props.linkText && }
examples:
<Panel kicker='Featured' title="Panel Title" subtitle="Panel subtitle" 
text="Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam, eaque ipsa quae ab illo inventore veritatis et quasi architectok."
linkText='Read More'
image='https://c8r.imgix.net/83b8be0c783f4adc7ed73918/58.jpg'/>

components.name: PanelAlt
components.jsx: {props.linkText && }
examples:
<PanelAlt title="Panel Title" subtitle="Panel subtitle" 
text="Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam, eaque ipsa quae ab illo inventore veritatis et quasi architectok."
linkText='Read More'
image='https://c8r.imgix.net/120f3501b903b57b3b5ec654/60.jpg'/>

components.name: Flexbox
Text
examples: <Text>For NASA, space is still a high priority.</Text>

components.name: Div
components.description: Generic Div for diving content and adding styles

components.name: SiteHeader
examples:
<SiteHeader 
src='https://c8r.imgix.net/87760e0718677237f07e486c/timothy.jpg'
links={[
  {
    href: '#0', 
    text: 'Writing' 
  },
  {
    href: '#0', 
    text: 'Work' 
  },
  {
    href: '#0', 
    text: 'projects' 
  },
  {
    href: '#0', 
    text: 'Case Studies' 
  },
   {
    href: '#0', 
    text: 'hi@email.com' 
  },
    ]} />

components.name: Tile
components.jsx:
<TileLink {...props}>
  <TileImage src={props.src}>
  <Flexbox p={4} wrap style={{ alignContent: 'flex-end', height: '100%' }}>

  <TileKicker w={1} children={props.kicker} />
    <TileTitle w={1} children={props.title} />
    <TileSubtitle w={1} children={props.subtitle} />
    
    <TileText w={1} children={props.text} />
    
    </Flexbox>
  </TileImage>
</TileLink>
examples:
<Tile 
color='white'
src='https://c8r.imgix.net/83b8be0c783f4adc7ed73918/58.jpg' 
title='This is text for a title.'
kicker="27 May 2015"
subtitle='By: Akil Johnson'
text='This is a bunch of potential text for the tile. Could be very long or very short.'
/>

components.name: TileLink
components.description: Wraps Tile component. Add interactions and animations here.

components.name: Meta
examples: <Meta>Meta text. For legal text. Secondary descriptions.</Meta>
components.description: Meta text. For legal text. Secondary descriptions.
